mapper.sql: bedIndex, DATE_FORMAT(begtime,"%Y-%m-%d") as begtime, DATE_FORMAT(endtime,"%Y-%m-%d") as endtime, monDiseaseName, monBedStatus, tueDiseaseName, tueBedStatus, wedDiseaseName, wedBedStatus, thuDiseaseName, thuBedStatus, friDiseaseName, friBedStatus, satDiseaseName, satBedStatus, sunDiseaseName, sunBedStatus
mapper.select:
select
from bm_bedstatus where 1=1
order by bedIndex

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(begtime,"%Y-%m-%d") as begtime, DATE_FORMAT(endtime,"%Y-%m-%d") as endtime from bm_bedstatus where 1=1
and begtime = STR_TO_DATE(#{begtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%Y-%m-%d")
and endtime = STR_TO_DATE(#{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%Y-%m-%d")
order by begtime desc limit 10
mapper.insert: insert into bm_bedstatus (bedIndex, begtime, endtime, monDiseaseName, monBedStatus, tueDiseaseName, tueBedStatus, wedDiseaseName, wedBedStatus, thuDiseaseName, thuBedStatus, friDiseaseName, friBedStatus, satDiseaseName, satBedStatus, sunDiseaseName, sunBedStatus) values (#{bedindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE(#{begtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%Y-%m-%d"), STR_TO_DATE(#{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%Y-%m-%d"), #{mondiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tuediseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tuebedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weddiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wedbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thudiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thubedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fridiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fribedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{satdiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{satbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sundiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sunbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into bm_bedstatus (bedIndex, begtime, endtime, monDiseaseName, monBedStatus, tueDiseaseName, tueBedStatus, wedDiseaseName, wedBedStatus, thuDiseaseName, thuBedStatus, friDiseaseName, friBedStatus, satDiseaseName, satBedStatus, sunDiseaseName, sunBedStatus) values
(#{item.bedindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STR_TO_DATE(#{item.begtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%Y-%m-%d"), STR_TO_DATE(#{item.endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%Y-%m-%d"), #{item.mondiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.monbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tuediseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tuebedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.weddiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.wedbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.thudiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.thubedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fridiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fribedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.satdiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.satbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sundiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sunbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update bm_bedstatus
monDiseaseName = #{mondiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monBedStatus = #{monbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tueDiseaseName = #{tuediseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tueBedStatus = #{tuebedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wedDiseaseName = #{weddiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wedBedStatus = #{wedbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thuDiseaseName = #{thudiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thuBedStatus = #{thubedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
friDiseaseName = #{fridiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
friBedStatus = #{fribedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
satDiseaseName = #{satdiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
satBedStatus = #{satbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sunDiseaseName = #{sundiseasename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sunBedStatus = #{sunbedstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where bedIndex = #{bedindex,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and begtime = STR_TO_DATE(#{begtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%Y-%m-%d") and endtime = STR_TO_DATE(#{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%Y-%m-%d")
